page.title: 13 CALNE YOUTH CENTRE
page.content: My mum works at the Youth Centre in Calne.The youth Centre is open on Monday from 6.45p.m. to 10.00p.m.. On Wednesday there is Karate from 7.30-10.00p.m..On Thursday from 6.30-9.00p.m. there is a games evening and on Friday from 6.30-8.30p.m..There is a canteen that sells drinks, hot or cold, sweets like Mars and Twix bars and lots more. My mum tells people off if they run about on the stairs or for kicking the ball in the hall. Sometimes she works in the canteen, she sits down and talks a lot.The hall can be used for badminton or basket ball. It is a very big hall , there are 2 badminton courts. Upstairs there is a snooker table, pool table and a table tennis table. Old people use the Centre for Bingo and the pre-school toddlers use the Centre for playgroup every morning of the week.
